item.description:
Phoenix is a great rock 'n roll band, and I haven't been out dancing for a couple weeks now, so I hope some of you will join me...here's what the band has to say...

This week we'll be performing on Saturday night only.  Come join us at Michael's Pub in Tyngsboro, MA.  Michael's is a great venue with pro sound and lights, a huge dance floor, full menu and bar, and GREAT MUSIC!!! 

Have you checked us out on Facebook yet? If not, please take a moment to go to this link: Phoenix on Facebook . Don't forget to click the "like" button!

As always, please help us build our fan base by telling your friends about Phoenix at   www.phoenixrocks.net

I'll be there for 7:30 for dinner and to grab a table.  Put in your reply, please, if you'll be there to eat.

Will do intros until the band starts, after that I'll see you on the dance floor...

stay cool!

suz

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Phoenix Rocks at Michaels in Tyngsboro
